</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Opens Steam overlay with given YT video. Video URL is the end part of the YT URL, starting with '''watch?v<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>...'''. If the user has Steam overlay disabled, the command will display appropriate message to the user and return [[false]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''openYoutubeVideo''' youTubeUrl </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> youTubeUrl: [[String]] - for parameters see: https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>//Open <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UBIAbm7Rt78</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
_isOpened = [[openYoutubeVideo]] "watch?v=UBIAbm7Rt78";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[openDSInterface]], [[openMap]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
